info: This gear <good>completely protects</good> you from <info>cold iron damage</info>.
This thing was crafted by a mad inventor.  It is very unstable and will rapidly degrade without an inventor's presence.
This weapon is primarily or mostly made of wood.
This character cannot be affected by Arvore pollens.
This gear will transform you into animal form, and may have some side effects.
This item can be recharged by an electrokinetic
This item has a <good>charm</good> on it.
This weapon does <good>extra damage</good> against creatures of the <info>Nether</info>.
